other_tests.findings: Sludge and multiple gallstones within the gallbladder; gallbladder not fully distended; gallbladder wall is thin; no evidence of focal lesions or textural abnormality in the liver; no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation; unremarkable pancreas; normal spleen size; normal kidney sizes; normal caliber aorta; normal visualized portions of the inferior vena cava; patent main portal vein with normal hepatopetal flow; no ascites.
NO POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES SEEN. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.
